programme.desc: Caithfidh Kevin tuairisc bháis a scríobh mar chuid de thasc scoile. (Kevin is forced to ponder life and death after he's asked to write his obituary for a school assignment.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Tabharfaidh Ciarán Ó Gealbháin cuairt ar Monk's Lane Bar i gCorcaigh. (With music from Johnny McCarthy, Eoin Ó Riabhaigh, Mairéad Ní Chathasaigh, Kate & Maedbh Ní Shé.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Ligeann Dorothy cead do Stan fanacht in éineacht léise i ndiaidh obráide. (Dorothy allows her ex-husband, Stan, to recuperate in her bedroom.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Cuirtear dúnmharú i leith neacht le Jessica, Victoria, in California. (Jessica's niece becomes a suspect in a murder case.)

programme.title: Ceolaireacht
programme.desc: Tabharfaidh an fidléir Doireann Ní Ghlacáin spléachadh ar cheol bríomhar Loch Garman. (Join fiddle player Doireann Ní Ghlacáin as she unearths the musical roots of Wexford.)

programme.title: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programme.desc: Téann Hayden ar chrús ar Abhainn Tweed sula réitíonn sé béile breá le portáin. (Hayden goes on a cruise on the Tweed River before creating a tasty salt-baked crab dish!)

programme.title: Glór Tíre - Súil Siar
programme.desc: Rogha de na hamhráin ab fhearr a chas Johnny Brady ar stáitse Ghlór Tíre. (A selection of some of the best of Johnny Brady's performances through the years on Glór Tíre.)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Tá bróga do ghasúir deartha ag inimirceach a bhíodh ina cónaí i gcampa dídeanaithe tráth. (An immigrant who once lived in a refugee camp presents her kids' shoe company.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Éadaí SOS
programme.desc: Tá Aoife Uí Mhuireagáin, as Béal Feirste, an-gafa leis an bhfaisean is déanaí. (This week we meet Belfast mother Aoife who is obsessed with the latest trends.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Ligeann Dorothy cead do Stan fanacht in éineacht léise i ndiaidh obráide. (Dorothy allows her ex-husband, Stan, to recuperate in her bedroom.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Caithfidh Kevin tuairisc bháis a scríobh mar chuid de thasc scoile. (Kevin is forced to ponder life and death after he's asked to write his obituary for a school assignment.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Nuacht TG4
programme.desc: Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)

programme.title: Abair Amhrán
programme.desc: Ceiliúradh ar amhráin a bhí againn ag éirí aníos. (Series which celebrates and takes a fresh look at the songs of our schooldays.)

programme.title: Scéalta ár Stampaí
programme.desc: Gheobhaidh Aedín Ní Thiarnaigh amach faoin gcaoi a léirítear plandaí na hÉireann ar stampaí na tíre. (Aedín Ní Thiarnaigh explores how our Irish plants are depicted on our stamps.)

programme.title: Feirmeoirí
programme.desc: Tagann grúpa turasóirí gan choinne chuig taispeántas madraí caorach Joe Joyce. (A group of tourists arrive unexpectedly at the sheepdog exhibition organised by Joe Joyce.)

programme.title: Bailte
programme.desc: Tugann Síle aghaidh ar Thoraigh, an t-oileán is faide amach ó chósta na hÉireann a bhfuil cónaí air.(Síle visits Toraigh, Ireland's most distant offshore inhabited island.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre Togha & Rogha
programme.desc: Rogha de na hamhráin ab fhearr a chas Johnny Brady ar stáitse Ghlór Tíre. (A selection of some of the best of Johnny Brady's performances through the years on Glór Tíre.)

programme.title: Opry le Daniel
programme.desc: Díreofar sa gclár seo ar an gcéad ghlúin eile d'amhránaithe ceoil tíre. (This programme will feature the next generation of young Irish country stars.)

programme.title: Better Call Saul
programme.desc: Tá Jimmy ag teacht chuige féin i ndiaidh mhíthapa agus tá Kim ag déanamh a machnaimh ar an saol.(Jimmy attempts to return to business as usual in the wake of his misadventure.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Fíorscéal
programme.desc: Tá eolaithe ar fud an domhain i mbun oibre chun ainmhithe atá i mbaol díothaithe a chosaint. (Scientists around the world are working to protect animals threatened with extinction.)

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: Faigheann Deborah síneadh láimhe nach raibh súil ar bith aici leis ag Bat Mitzvah. (As Deborah scrambles to keep her dates intact, an unexpected tip drops in her lap at a bat mitzvah.)
